elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Assign the three provisions to the correct level of the hierarchy of standards.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Air pollution, noise, vibrations and radiation are limited by measures at source (emission limits).
choices: Ordinance Art. 5 para. 1 Noise and Laser Ordinance (SLV)
Law Art. 11 para. 1 Environmental Protection Act (EPA)
elements.correctAnswer: Law Art. 11 para. 1 Environmental Protection Act (EPA)

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Anyone organizing events must limit noise emissions to such an extent that the immissions generated by the event do not exceed the hourly level of 93 dB(A) for the entire duration of the event.
choices: Ordinance Art. 5 para. 1 Noise and Laser Ordinance (SLV)
Law Art. 11 para. 1 Environmental Protection Act (EPA)
elements.correctAnswer: Ordinance Art. 5 para. 1 Noise and Laser Ordinance (SLV)

elements.name: question2
elements.title: The Confederation shall issue regulations on the protection of humans and their natural environment from harmful or annoying effects.
choices: Ordinance Art. 5 para. 1 Noise and Laser Ordinance (SLV)
Law Art. 11 para. 1 Environmental Protection Act (EPA)
